description: Identifier of the KPI that this default setting applies to in the fleet metrics catalog.
Unique identifier for the default setting record associated with a KPI, used for configuration management and referencing.
Default numeric parameter for the KPI—such as a target, threshold, or limit—applied when no custom value exists; exact meaning depends on the KPI; confirm with SME.
Data type of the default value for the KPI (e.g., integer, decimal, percentage), used to validate input and control display/formatting.
